title: 42. "Dear Mama" How a Wounded Relationship with Your Mother can Affect the Self
description:
Hey girl!

In this episode, we chat about the effects of a difficult relationship/abusive relationship with the mothers in our lives. You are not going to want to miss this as we explore the effects this relationship can have on our self-esteem & ways of relating to the world AND tips on how to begin healing from the wounds of the broken relationship. Tune in to listen now!

Please don't forget to rate & review!
